original_title: DMT deputy commissioner, clerk and broker arrested over bribe
original_body_lines: A Deputy Commissioner, and a clerk from the Department of Motor Traffic (DMT), as well as a broker have been arrested by the Bribery Commission officers while accepting a bribe.
They have been arrested for soliciting a bribe of Rs. 300,000 to facilitate the transfer of ownership of three buses, according to the Bribery Commission.
